comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Julius was born 1906, Jack was born 1915, according to this interview with their sister Pearl: www.ironrangejewishheritage.org/gallery-documents/Newslet... Julius died in 1975, from this record from the Hollywood Memorial Gardens cemetery in Florida: www.learnwebskills.com/browardcem/hollywest5.htm
